content: Credit Card Savings General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 15 Oct 2018Anyone tried the LiveUP program by LAZADA? Is it worth it and which card should I use?Considering to get as my colleagues at work have been talking about this intensely and I do shop online quite abit! Maybe $100 each month?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 07 Jun 2019For redmart, use CTB (Citibank credit card) for 8% rebates and 5% for other cards and min $40 order can get free delivery 365 days a year morning till night, so very flexible and good. Live up credit quite worth it (I compare it as Fairprice points redeem) but has short expiry date ( to get people spend fast !)Lazada must find deals then worth it. The taoabo collection within not good , more expensive than buying direct from taobao.Netflix is nice and worth it. Steaming quality is good, only downside is limited new TV show2 comments1
Cherie Julianne Tan15 Oct 2018Sorry HC! What's CTB?HC Tang15 Oct 2018haha .. sorry too much abbreviation use. It's citibank credit card :)  Updated in the main reply :)
